Description: Available 9/1/23! Super cool and unique 3 bed 2 bath located on Lilcac Court in Cambridge! This unit is very modern and comes complete with hardwood floors and very high ceilings. The kitchen is modern with all stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, oven/range, and a fridge. Living area has high vaulted ceilings and gets drenched in sunlight! This is for sure the heart of the home, making it great for hosting! All 3 bedrooms are a great size and will have no trouble fitting a full sized bed. Both bathrooms are fully tiled. Laundry in unit private outdoor patio Please call today with any questions!
